column1: This is an overview of the available character creation options, and not an editable sheet. To add or change options, edit the hidden CUSTOMDATA sheet (changes will be reflected here).

column2: Drives

column3: Backgrounds with a superscript number (like this²) indicate that there's another background with the same name, but with a different skill.
column5: Occupations with a superscript number (like this²) indicate that there's another occupation with the same name, but with at least one different skill.
